mapper.select: SELECT ct.clid,img.`gimgurl`,gprice.`price`,goods.`gdname` FROM collect ct JOIN goodsinfo goods ON ct.gdid=goods.gdid ##单品编号 JOIN goodsimage img ON goods.gdid=img.gdid ##商品图片 JOIN goodsprice gprice ON gprice.gdid=goods.gdid ##商品价格 JOIN USER ON ct.clid=user.userid WHERE ct.userid=#{userid} AND img.gimgtype=1 AND gprice.utid=user.utid;
